response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by us, reflecting its quality, craftsmanship, and unique features. Considering its high value and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire it at a special introductory price of $14,000. We believe this offer presents a fantastic opportunity for you to experience the unparalleled excellence of our product while also securing a significant saving. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product.", "product_price": 14000}
